entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Local amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
